example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <BadgePrimitive>Tip</BadgePrimitive>
    <BadgePrimitive ariaLabel="Train" icon={<Icons.Train />} />
    <BadgePrimitive ariaLabel="4 passengers" icon={<Icons.Passengers />}>
      4
    </BadgePrimitive>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Default badge primitives
info.description: By default, badge primitives have padding with no background and ink text.

info.title: Default illustration primitive
info.description: Illustration primitives by default come in medium. By default, the name of the illustration is used for alt text. This might not be meaningful so include meaningful alt text when appropriate. If the same text is present next to the illustration, use an empty string for the alt prop.
